io.hekate.network

Interface NetworkMessage<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Message data type.

    public interface NetworkMessage<T>
    Buffered message.

    This class represents a buffered message that was received by a NetworkEndpoint. Obtaining real content of this message can be performed by calling decode() method that will apply an underlying codec to the buffered content of this message.

    Asynchronous decoding and handling of this message can be performed by calling handleAsync(...) method.

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        T decode()
  throws IOException
        Decodes this message by applying an underlying Codec.
        Returns:
        Decoded message.
        Throws:
        IOException - Message decoding failure.
        See Also:
        NetworkConnectorConfig.setMessageCodec(CodecFactory), handleAsync(Executor, Consumer, Consumer)

      • handleAsync

        void handleAsync(Executor worker,
                 Consumer<T> handler,
                 Consumer<Throwable> onError)
        Asynchronously decodes and processes this message on a thread of the specified executor.
        Parameters:
        worker - Executor.
        handler - Handler that will be invoked if message decoding was successful.
        onError - Handler that will be invoked if message decoding failed.

      • preview

        <V> V preview(NetworkMessage.Preview<V> preview)
       throws IOException
        Applies the specified preview function to this message. Such function can be used to inspect the content of this message without performing the complete decoding.
        Type Parameters:
        V - Type of result.
        Parameters:
        preview - Preview function.
        Returns:
        Result of function application.
        Throws:
        IOException - Message reading failure.
